Articles.Content: I'm looking for a part mod similar to the critter crawler part that adds some giant robot legs that can actually walk. Either by faking it with "wheels" or through some other method.

Try Infernal Robotics, with some practice you can make walking legs. Just dont bother making it bipedal as a first try. Youtuber Robbaz one made a 8-legged spider thing, perhaps that can give some inspiratoon?
IR Sequencer looks like a promising add-on to Infernal Robotics to help make a walker [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116076](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116076)
